description:
In this first-person puzzle game, solve riddles, decipher secret languages and survive deadly traps in seven different atmospheres filled with mystery and enigma. Immerse yourself in unique environments: whether itâ€™s a dark, antique baroque-inspired atmosphere or a giant chess game, no two rooms are the same. Test your puzzle-solving skills and find out what lies beyond the seventh door, that is, if you make it through all seven.

- Explore seven enigmas behind seven different doors, each with their own unique atmosphere
- Engage in approximately 2-3 hours of challenging puzzle-solving gameplay
- Get engrossed in a rich soundtrack highly praised by reviewers
- Discover even more secret enigmas after the seventh door in this newly, expanded version of the game
name: Seven Doors
